title: Mathematics Foundational Skills Enhancement Program Utilizing Concrete-to-Abstract Instructional Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based LMS environment, learners aim to improve foundational math skills applicable to everyday social issues

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic properties (area, perimeter) of geometric shapes with 80% accuracy through manipulation of concrete objects.
Learners can solve real-life problems (budget calculations, ratio applications) by converting them into abstract algebraic expressions.
Learners successfully apply problem-solving strategies using concrete-to-abstract transition processes in formative assessments three or more times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
